com.plusauth.android.auth.login

Class LoginRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.plusauth.android.auth.login.LoginRequest

  • public class LoginRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for configuring OIDC login. By default uses authorization code flow with pkce for maximum security.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LoginRequest()

      Sets audience for login request.

      Sets the allowed clock skew that will be used for token expiry validation.

      If system supports CustomTabs, these options will be used to customize it.

      Sets max_age for login request.

      • setResponseType

        public LoginRequest setResponseType(ResponseType... type)
        Sets response_type for login request. Defaults to ResponseType.CODE for maximum security together with pkce.
        Parameters:
        type - value to be used, multiple values will be concatenated according to spec
        Returns:
        this
